### Task 2 - Validation & Testing

Below are a (incomplete) collection of test cases that have been separated into good and bad inputs. After you have implemented the function above check that the test cases below produce the correct output (or at least a useful error message).

#### Good Inputs

```{r good_inputs}
fizzbuzz(1)
fizzbuzz(3)
fizzbuzz(5)
fizzbuzz(15)

fizzbuzz(9:15)
fizzbuzz(15:9)

fizzbuzz(1:12)
```


#### Bad Inputs

```{r bad_inputs, error=TRUE}
fizzbuzz(-1)
fizzbuzz(-3)
fizzbuzz(-5)

fizzbuzz(TRUE)
fizzbuzz(FALSE)

fizzbuzz(Inf)
fizzbuzz(-Inf)
fizzbuzz(NaN)

fizzbuzz("A")
fizzbuzz(1.5)
fizzbuzz(1i)
fizzbuzz(4i)
```
